|Title=Knowing the main long-term consequences of HGI in women

Pelvic inflammatory disease, tubal infertility and ectopic pregnancy

properties.question: What are the main long-term consequences of untreated pelvic inflammatory disease (PID) in women?
properties.option_a: Increased risk of urinary tract infections
properties.option_c: Improved fertility and reduced risk of miscarriage
properties.option_d: Decreased risk of sexually transmitted infections (STIs)
